attributes.title: 0/10 this app is awful
attributes.review: I wish this app never downloaded onto my phone wow. It is designed horribly and has awful content and propaganda. I would not recommend this app to anyone. Please take it off of the App Store.

attributes.title: AWFUL!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded it and everything seemed fine, but then it glitched and it kept shutting down my phone! Now every time I try to open the app it shuts my whole phone down! It’s just terrible!!!

attributes.title: Wish I could give it zero stars 🤮🤧
attributes.review: First of all, they spelt Drumpf wrong (Original family name). On top of that, right after I downloaded it, the app started leaking sensitive information of mine to China!! High security risk and should be removed from the App Store 👎🏻.

attributes.title: I hate this app😾💔
attributes.review: first off I would like to say that this app made me have a manic episode because of all the stupidity on its secondly, it tracked down my family’s IP address and murdered all of them. Sadly to say, then the app corrupted my device and electrocuted me in my sleep. Worst. App. Ever 🙄

attributes.title: Hate this
attributes.review: When I opened this app all of a sudden I started getting flashbacks to Cheeto mans nudes. 🤮 I had to get rushed to the hospital cause my eyes were in the back of my head and I kept on saying it’s looks like a shrimp. The doctors told me I was lucky enough I didn’t die.

attributes.title: disgusting horrifying absolutely gross
attributes.review: this app has had such a negative impact on me it truly ruined my life. the amount of hate i have for this app is astronomical 😡😡😡 PLEASE take it down i beg you. everything on this app puts people in danger!! get this off the app store now.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TRASH
attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i can keep up with the presidents AND NOTHING IS HELPING ME all i just see is the president and i don’t wanna see him . it also glitches a lot it’s NOT HELPFUL AT ALL it just wastes my storage and wasted my time . I DO NOT RECCOMEND this app it’s absolutely USELESS and won’t get u anywhere . thank u 😀

attributes.title: Literally terrible app 😬
attributes.review: I opened it up expecting to get daily updates on the news and instead there was a terrible log in system and it took h o u r s to set up the account a truly terrible app would not recommend

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i got this app to read statements from the president🤢 but this app is a nightmare!!! do not get this app✨ it glitched my entire phone and broke it🙈 (i’m writing this from my LG Turbowash Series 5.7 cu. ft. 29” Top Load Washer btw😀) would not recommend unless you want ~trauma~😝 and even more therapy sessions😘

attributes.title: Horrible and terrifying experience
attributes.review: So I gave birth to my baby boy and he started crying because he told me that the app was going to haunt us forever. I didn’t believe him because he just came out the womb but he wasn’t lying.....(like for part two🤪)😭scary
